revised_title: Chinese Astronomy and Antiquities: A Historical Overview
tldr: The author, Father Gaubil, discusses the history and knowledge of Chinese astronomy and antiquities. He explains how the Chinese had some understanding of astronomical concepts, such as the passage of the sun and stars, without having a deep knowledge of spherical trigonometry. Father Gaubil also mentions the challenges and opportunities for European scholars studying Chinese history and astronomy.
